name: iron-barbs
effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
